news_header: Nokia CEO Pekka Lundmark will be replaced by Justin Hotard by the end of March.
news_original_title: Nokia viestii sijoittajille uutta suuntaa – Kuka on Justin Hotard, miten nimitys otettiin vastaan, ja mitä se Nokialle tarkoittaa?
news_text: Online equipment company Nokia announced that Pekka Lundmark, the CEO since 2020, will be excluded from operational management by the end of March, with Justin Hotard taking over as the new CEO.
